item.title: Git as a discovery tool
item.description: I’m a huge fan of Git and it’s capabilities not only for source code, but a variety of other use cases. At $previousjob, I spearheaded a project to migrate an extensive amount of infrastructure and OS level customisations from Puppet to Ansible and subsequently relied on git to keep me honest about what i’d missed or misconfigured.
